True sympathy between man and his fellow man is to be the sign distinguishing those who love and fear God from those who are unmindful of His law. How great the sympathy that Christ expressed in coming to this world to give His life a sacrifice for a dying world. His religion led to the doing of genuine 


                             -342- 

medical missionary work. He was a healing power; "I will have mercy and not sacrifice," He said. This is the test that the great Author of truth used to distinguish between true religion and false.
